entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 11 inland.

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
